sentences.sContent: All of those advantages, for sure.
But one thing is for sure, traveling will be much easier from now on, as I can leave whenever I want without having to juggle rent, the dog, and, well, stuff.
sentences.sContent_eng: But one thing is for sure, traveling will be much easier from now on, as I can leave whenever I want without having to juggle rent, the dog, and, well, stuff.
sentences.sCn: 但有一点我确信的是，以后的旅行将会变得更加容易。 因为只要我想，我可以随时启程，我不会再让房租，狗，这种琐事填满我的脑子。
